title: Lag on NA?
body: Hey,I recently made a new account on NA from EUNE and i have 100+ping,just on NA,on EUNE i have 30...Can someone tell me why and maybe help me?

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any server issues that could be causing lag for players currently, and nothing is up at our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  

You do have quite a physical distance reaching the NA region though, which is very likely the cause of your lag or high ping.  You can go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection, but you can't exceed that physical distance.  Your best bet may be to play on a closer region.  I hope that helps!
